title.narrative: Supporting Vietnam in enhancing effective implementation of maritime strategy

description.narrative:
This project is to support a delegation from Vietnam Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MOFA) and Ministry of National Resources and Environment (MONRE) to undertake a study visit to Denmark to learn from Denmark’s experience in developing an effective management mechanism in implementation of maritime strategy, especially sustainable blue economy while ensuring national defense and interests; application of science and technology in conducting basic survey and seeking cooperation opportunities with Danish partners in this field; study Danish experience in resolving maritime disputes and joint development with its neighboring countries.
The Embassy has engaged the Geological Survey of Denmark and Greenland (GEUS) to host the visit, develop the visit programme and arrange all the programme elements.

mailing-address.narrative: Embassy of Denmark, 7th Floor, BIDV Tower, 194 Tran Quang Khai Street
